mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MOVIE (M_ID, TITLE, GNR, DIRECTOR, RUNNINGTIME, RESTRICT, ONAIR ,POSTER ,IMG1, IMG2, IMG3, IMG4, IMG5,CONTENT,VOTE) VALUES ((SELECT NVL(MAX(M_ID),0)+1 FROM MOVIE), #{title}, #{gnr}, #{director}, #{runningtime}, #{restrict}, #{onair} ,#{poster} ,#{img1}, #{img2}, #{img3}, #{img4}, #{img5} ,#{content},0)
